pal_bivariate()
Generates a bivariate palette
pal_vsup()
Generates a VSUP palette
scale_type(<distribution>)
Sets default scale for distribution objects Default scale for distribution objects is continuous
toy_temp
A toy data set that has the ambient temperature as measured by a collection of citizen scientists for each Iowa county
toy_temp_dist
A toy data set that provides data for a map with the temperature of each area represented by a random variable.

Developed by Harriet Mason, Dianne Cook, Sarah Goodwin, Susan VanderPlas.
